Thank you

Kind Regards,

Hi Renee,

Confirming we have updated the homepage.
https://bespokechildcare.com.au/

Redirects has been put in place as well. Please see the attached.

Here is the website images from 2016-2025.
https://drive.google.com/file/d/19Sr-Sa7W-wD1OKZadqszWbnGhnQajpjE/view?usp=sharing

Hi Joel,

Thank you for reaching out. I appreciate your time, and I apologise for any confusion in my previous email. My intention was for the page to match the layout exactly as presented in the attached PDF.

I've reattached the PDF with some additional items noted. Please feel free to give me a call if that would help clarify anything further.
Thank you

Kind Regards,

Renee Eyles-Oberg

Head of Sales & Marketing
Little Scribblers Early Learning Centres

HEAD OFFICE - Centre of Excellence
106 Russell Avenue
Dolls Point NSW 2219

T: 0461422 666
E: renee@littlescribblers.com.au
Web: www.littlescribblers.com.au

Hi Renee,

I hope all is well.

Just jumping in on behalf of Heath and Rica. Confirming the page is now updated.
https://bespokechildcare.com.au/

Hi Renee,

Hope you are doing well. 

This is to notify you that we received your request and we are already working on it. 

We will get back to you as quickly as possible with the details.

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia ran the **Needs Joel's assistance** workflow
Workflows ran the **Needs Joel's assistance** workflow

full_threads.body: Hi @joel need your help with this ticket. Thanks!

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Rica Rosario Valencia

full_threads.body:
Hi Heath,
I hope you had a lovely weekend. Can you please assist us in making the attached changes to the bespoke website, as currently little scribblers gets a little lost on their webpage.
Thank you

Kind Regards,

Hi Renee,

Sure, we have now added a button to the home page, just below the header, along with a call-out message.

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Heath Maguire

full_threads.body:
Hi Heath,
That you so much for addressing this so quickly, as per my previous email I was also wondering if we could add somewhere on the first page, a note and our logo to the front page, such as "Bespoke is proud to now be part of Little Scribblers" or something similar?

This way families will begin to understand the connection?


Thank you

Kind Regards,

Renee Eyles-Oberg

Head of Sales & Marketing
Little Scribblers Early Learning Centres

HEAD OFFICE - Centre of Excellence
106 Russell Avenue
Dolls Point NSW 2219

T: 0461422 666
E: renee@littlescribblers.com.au
Web: www.littlescribblers.com.au


On 28 Jan 2025, at 11:18 PM, Wolf IQ Support <support@wolfiq.com.au> wrote:

Additionally, would it be possible to add a note to the front page, such as "Bespoke is proud to now be part of Little Scribblers" or something similar?
